attributes.action: Grit foot and cycle paths in icy weather
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For the good of the nations health and to help reduce pollution we are advised to walk or cycle to work.  However during the Winter gritting of foot and cycle paths is at the discretion of local authorities and is generally not done.  I would like the government to put pressure on local authorities to grit both foot and cycle paths as they would roads.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to your local authority.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
